layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  RenderView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x80
  RenderBlock {test} at (0,0) size 800x80
    RenderBlock {p} at (0,16) size 800x16
      RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 84x16
        text run at (0,0) width 84: "This test has "
      RenderInline {span} at (0,0) size 61x16
        RenderInline (pseudo:before) at (0,0) size 61x16 [bgcolor=#00FF00]
          RenderTextFragment at (83,0) size 61x16
            text run at (83,0) width 61: "PASSED"
      RenderText {#text} at (143,0) size 5x16
        text run at (143,0) width 5: "."
    RenderBlock {p} at (0,48) size 800x16
      RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 457x16
        text run at (0,0) width 457: "(If the previous line just reads \"This test has .\" then this test has failed.)"
